title: Chao Neng Long Qi Xia
synopsis: The new Dragon Knight, the flower-giving young Guoguo once sealed the evil black captain with the help of a good friend. After a long and unremarkable life, Guoguo's heart began to agitate again. However, he pursued speed and strength and could only use his heroic blood to fight his uncle. Accompanied by a bizarre fire, a water elf named Tick completely subverted his life, and a new adventure began. 　　 Guoguo once again convened old partners Miao Miao and Xiao Tou Si to venture into the mysterious water elf factory, only to discover that behind the elf factory, which seems to be prosperous and prosperous on the ground, actually hides terrible secrets! In the face of the hospitable fire demon and the mystery of the whereabouts of Brother Yin, who is the real owner of the factory? And is it a misunderstanding or a fateful showdown waiting for Guoguo? How did the once cute and timid little flame turn into a arrogant fire demon? Could there be more mysterious powers hidden behind the truth? All these disputes and answers are waiting for Dragon Knight Guoguo to reveal one by one with the wisdom of the heart. 　　The ambitious man behind the scenes step by step, please enter the urn, Guoguo is in crisis of life and death! Can he and his partners untie the knot and let the clear and delicious spring water flow in the beautiful mountains and rivers of Shuizhizhou again? Although growth is accompanied by infinite troubles, the young hero Dragoon will surely prove once again that he can change the whole world with love and courage on a difficult journey! (translated from douban)
